senses.sense_definition: One of the five boroughs of New York City, located primarily on an island of the same name; it is the city's historical, cultural, and financial center.

examples.text: We took a taxi into <w>Manhattan</w> to see a Broadway show.
The skyline of <w>Manhattan</w> is one of the most recognizable views in the world.

senses.sense_definition: An indigenous people of North America who historically inhabited the area now known as New York City.

examples.text: The <w>Manhattan</w> were the original inhabitants of the island before European settlement.
Historians study the early interactions between the <w>Manhattan</w> and Dutch traders.

senses.sense_definition: A cocktail made from whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters, usually garnished with a cherry.

examples.text: She sat at the bar and ordered a <w>Manhattan</w> to start the evening.
The bartender makes a perfect <w>Manhattan</w> using rye whiskey.

senses.sense_definition: A bar chart used in cricket statistics to show the number of runs scored in each over, resembling a city skyline.

examples.text: The television broadcast displayed a <w>Manhattan</w> to illustrate the team's scoring rate.
Analysts looked at the <w>Manhattan</w> to see which overs were the most productive.
